languages.text: {n}Едва переменившись в лице, Кассия сдержанно кивает:{/n} "Отрадно слышать, Лорд-капитан. Меня тоже устраивает ваша манера командования".

traits.locale_text: {n}Едва переменившись в лице, Кассия сдержанно кивает:{/n} "Отрадно слышать, Лорд-капитан. Меня тоже устраивает ваша манера командования".

languages.text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."
languages.original_text: {n}Едва переменившись в лице, Кассия сдержанно кивает:{/n} "Отрадно слышать, Лорд-капитан. Меня тоже устраивает ваша манера командования".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally well satisfied with your manner of command."
{n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally well satisfied with your manner of command."
{n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."
{n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."
{n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅的表情微微一变，随后矜持地点了点头。{/n}“很荣幸听到你的赞扬，舰长大人。你的指挥能力也同样让我非常满意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅的表情微微一变，随后矜持地点了点头。{/n}“很荣幸听到你的赞扬，舰长大人。你的指挥能力也同样让我非常满意。”

languages.text: {n}Cassias Miene verändert sich leicht und sie nickt reserviert.{/n} "Es freut mich, das zu hören, Lord Captain. Ich bin ebenso zufrieden mit Eurer Führung."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias Miene verändert sich leicht und sie nickt reserviert.{/n} "Es freut mich, das zu hören, Lord Captain. Ich bin ebenso zufrieden mit Eurer Führung."

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Cassia change presque imperceptiblement, et elle hoche timidement la tête.{/n} « Ça fait plaisir à entendre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis également satisfaite de votre façon de commander. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Cassia change presque imperceptiblement, et elle hoche timidement la tête.{/n} « Ça fait plaisir à entendre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis également satisfaite de votre façon de commander. »

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Cassia cambia sutilmente y asiente reservada.{/n} «Me complace oír eso, Lord Capitán. Estoy igualmente satisfecha con su mandato».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Cassia cambia sutilmente y asiente reservada.{/n} «Me complace oír eso, Lord Capitán. Estoy igualmente satisfecha con su mandato».

languages.text: {n}カシアの表情は微妙に変化し、遠慮がちにうなずいた。{/n}「それを聞いて嬉しく思います、ロード・キャプテン。同じように、{name}様が指揮する方法にも満足しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの表情は微妙に変化し、遠慮がちにうなずいた。{/n}「それを聞いて嬉しく思います、ロード・キャプテン。同じように、{name}様が指揮する方法にも満足しています」

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın ifadesi hafifçe değişiyor. Çekingen bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim Lord Kaptan. Ben de senin komuta kabiliyetinden memnunum."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's expression changes subtly, and she gives a reserved nod.{/n} "It pleases me to hear this, Lord Captain. I am equally satisfied with your manner of command."
